definitions.definition: Something taught by a religious or philosophical authority.
examples: Many follow the teachings of Confucius.

definitions.definition: The profession of educating people; the activity that a teacher does when he/she teaches.
examples: Teaching has seen continual changes over the past decades.
I have found a teaching job.

main_definition: Something taught by a religious or philosophical authority.
secondary_definitions: The profession of educating people; the activity that a teacher does when he/she teaches.
